trends: There has been one other sighting in Effort
There were no other sightings in Effort on or around December 19th 2012
Summary: Bright Bright reflective cigar shaped light that appeared to hover and progress at an extreme speed out of sight.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had left home to go to town to run errands and after going thru the intersection was blinded by the reflected lighted object in the sky in front of myself and another car. We both saw it and slowed our speed because it was blinding to drive with the reflection, and as quick as it was there it was gone. I do not know who the person in front of me was, they drove a dark red compact car. It progressed out of site at a rate of speed that no airplane can travel and was gone from site. Normally I would try to take pics from my phone, but this event left me dumbfounded, I still can't believe I am talking about this. Thank you for listening.
